    Description

    initialize​(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
    Overridden initialize method for initial setup
    void
    initialSetup()
    This method initializes game before each round
    void
    levelEnd()
    This method calls lastRoundCalculation method and send player Score and opponent Score to onLevelEnd method
    void
    makeRound()
    This method handles dealing cards and assign event handler to each player's card and sets deckImage to invisible id there's no card in deck
    void
    onClickDealCardButton()
    This method calls makeRound method, when the Deal Card button on deck is pressed
    void
    onLevelEnd()
    This method decides match will continue or end
    void
    showLevel2Result​(int winner)
    This method shows the result of Level 2 to Player if Player wins, there will be green background and Continue button for going Level 3 if Player loses, there will be red background and Back to Dashboard button for going Dashboard

    • initialSetup

      public void initialSetup()
      This method initializes game before each round

    • makeRound

      public void makeRound()
      This method handles dealing cards and assign event handler to each player's card and sets deckImage to invisible id there's no card in deck

    • levelEnd

      public void levelEnd()
      This method calls lastRoundCalculation method and send player Score and opponent Score to onLevelEnd method

    • onLevelEnd

      public void onLevelEnd()
      This method decides match will continue or end

    • onClickDealCardButton

      public void onClickDealCardButton()
      This method calls makeRound method, when the Deal Card button on deck is pressed

    • showLevel2Result

      public void showLevel2Result​(int winner)
      This method shows the result of Level 2 to Player if Player wins, there will be green background and Continue button for going Level 3 if Player loses, there will be red background and Back to Dashboard button for going Dashboard
      Parameters:
      winner - This argument is for specifying winner as 0 stands for opponent, 1 stands for Player
